comments: "This server aims to demonstrate Osiris, a set of phylogenetics tools for the Galaxy Bioinformatics platform. Because it is only a demo, some computationally intensive tools are disabled. Other tools will be slow because this is a public, shared resource."
citations: [Osiris: accessible and reproducible phylogenetic and phylogenomic analyses within the Galaxy workflow management system](http://www.biomedcentral.com/1471-2105/15/230/abstract), by Oakley, *et al.* in *[BMC Bioinformatics](http://www.biomedcentral.com/bmcbioinformatics/)* 2014, 15:230  doi:10.1186/1471-2105-15-230
